definition[0]: to trust or depend on someone or something to do what you need or expect them to do
example[0]: I knew I could rely on David.
example[1]: Many working women rely on relatives to help take care of their children.
note[0]: rely on somebody/something to do something
example[2]: Many people now rely on the Internet for news.
definition[1]: to depend on something in order to continue to live or exist
example[3]: The company relies heavily on only a few contracts.
example[4]: They have to rely on the river for their water.
